Dear Mr. Justice,
I am an amateur genealogist trying to trace my family history, and I have run across an ancestor with
the Justice name, who lived in New Bern in the 1800s. I'm writing to you in hopes that you might
be related to my ancestor.
My great-grandfather was Harry Hamilton Disosway. His parents were Israel Disosway and Anne
Mariah Justice. I have checked the US Census records from 1850, 1860, 1870, and 1880 for New
Bern. These records indicate that Anne Mariah Justice was born around 1827; she had a sister
named Elizabeth Justice (who was born around 1817); Anne married Israel Disosway around 1855
(Israel ran a drug store); and together they had 6 children:
John (Israel?) Disosway
Reginald Justice Disosway
Harry Hamilton Disosway
Emma (or Annie) Disosway
Clarence Disosway
John Disosway
